248:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyavanapradeśe nirmānuṣasaṃpātanīrave vividhamṛgakulādhivāse tṛṇagahananimagnamūlavṛkṣakṣupabahule pathikayānavāhanacaraṇairavinyastamārgasimāntalekhe salilamārgavalmīkaśvabhraviṣamabhūbhāge balajavavarṇasattvasaṃpannaḥ saṃhananavatkāyopapannaḥ śarabho mṛgo babhūva|
248:4: sa kāruṇyābhyāsādanabhidrugdhacittaḥ sattveṣu tṛṇaparṇasalilamātravṛttiḥ saṃtoṣaguṇādaraṇyavāsaniratamatiḥ pravivekakāma iva yogī tamaraṇyapradeśamabhyalaṃcakāra|
248:6: cacāra tasmin sa vane vivikte yogīva saṃtuṣṭamatistṛṇāgraiḥ||1||
248:7: atha kadācidanyatamo rājā tasya viṣayasyādhipatisturagavarādhirūḍhaḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrapāṇirmṛgeṣvastrakauśalamātmano jijñāsamānaḥ saṃrāgavaśājjavena mṛgānanupatannuttamajavena vājinā dūrādapasṛtahastyaśvarathapadātikāyastaṃ pradeśamupajagāma|
248:8: dūradeva cālokya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ hantumutpatitaniścayaḥ samutkṛṣṭaniśitasāyako yataḥ sa mahātmā tena turagavaraṃ saṃcodayāmāsa|
248:9: atha bodhisattvaḥ samālokyaiva turagavaragataṃ sāyudhamabhipatantaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ śaktimānapi pratyavasthātuṃ nivṛttasāhasasaṃrambhatvātpareṇa javātiśayena samutpapāta|
248:10: so'nugamyamānastena turaṃgameṇānumārgāgataṃ mahacchvabhraṃ goṣpadamiva javena laṅghayitvā pradudrāva|
248:11: atha turagavarastenaiva mārgeṇa taṃ śarabhamanupatannuttamena javapramāṇena tacchvabhramāsādya laṅgayitumanadhyavasitamatiḥ sahasā vyatiṣṭhata|
248:14: nibaddhacakṣuḥ śarabhe sa tasmin saṃlakṣayāmāsa na taṃ prapātam|
248:16: atha bodhisattvasturagakhuraśabdapraśamātkiṃ nu khalu pratinivṛttaḥ syādayaṃ rājeti samutpannavitarkaḥ paścādāvarjitāvadanaḥ samālokayan dadarśa tamaśvamanārohakaṃ tasmin prapātoddeśe'vasthitam|
248:17: tasya buddhirabhavat-niyatamatra prapāte nipatitaḥ sa rājā|
248:18: na hyatra kiṃcidviśramahetoḥ saṃśrayaṇīyarūpaṃ ghanapracchāyaṃ vṛkṣamūlamasti nīlotpaladalanīlavimalasalilamavagāhayogyaṃ vā saraḥ|
248:19: na caiva vyālamṛgānuvicaritamaraṇyavanamavagāḍhena yatra kvacidupasṛjya turagavaraṃ viśramyate mṛgayā vānuṣṭhiyate|
248:20: na cātra kiṃcittṛṇagahanamapi tadvidhaṃ yatra nilīnaḥ syāt|
248:21: tadvyaktamātra śvabhre nipatitena tena rājñā bhavitavyamiti|
248:22: tataḥ sa mahātmā niścayamupetya vadhake'pi tasmin parāṃ karuṇāmupajagāma|
248:28: murchānvitaḥ śokaparāyaṇo vā kaṣṭaṃ bata kleśamayaṃ prapannaḥ||6||
248:29: kiṇāṅkitānīva manāṃsi duḥkhairna hīnavargasya tathā vyathante|
248:32: yadyapi sāvaśeṣaprāṇastannāyamupekṣituṃ yuktamiti vitarkayan sa mahātmā karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇahṛdayastaṃ prapātataṭāntamupajagāma|
248:33: dadarśa cainaṃ tatra reṇusaṃsargānmṛditavārabāṇaśobhaṃ vyākulitoṣṇīṣavasanasaṃnāhaṃ prapātapatananighātasaṃjānītābhirvedanābhirāpīḍyamānahṛdayamāpatitavaitānyaṃ viceṣṭamānam|
248:34: dṛṣṭvāya taṃ tatra viceṣṭamānaṃ narādhipaṃ bāṣpaparītanetraḥ|
248:39: kaccinna te vikṣatamatra gātraṃ kaccidrujaste tanutāṃ gacchanti||10||
248:42: prapātapātādadhṛtiṃ ca mā gāḥ śakto'hamuddhartumito bhavantam|
248:44: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhatenābhivyāhāreṇa vismayāvarjitahṛdayaḥ saṃjāyamānavrīḍo niyatamiti cintāmāpede-
248:45: dṛṣṭāvadāne dviṣati kā nāmāsya dayā mayi|
248:51: prapātaniṣpeṣakṛtāḥ sahyā eva ca me rujaḥ||15||
248:55: avijñāya svabhāvaṃ te tacca mā hṛdaye kṛthāḥ||17||
248:56: atha śarabhastasya rājñaḥ prītisūcakena tenābhivyāhāreṇānumatamuddharaṇamavetya puruṣabhāragurvyā śīlayā taduddharaṇayogyāṃ kṛtvā viditātmabalapramāṇastaṃ nṛpatimuddhartuṃ vyavasitamatiravatīrya taṃ prapātaṃ savinayamabhigamyovāca-
248:59: tadārohatu matpuṣṭhaṃ mahārājaḥ sulagnaśca mayi bhavatviti|
248:63: uddhṛtya durgādatha taṃ narendraṃ prītaḥ samānīya turaṃgameṇa|
248:64: nivedya cāsmai svapurāya mārgaṃ vanaprayāṇābhimukho babhūva||20||
248:65: atha sa rājā kṛtajñatvāttena tasya vinayamadhureṇopacāreṇa samāvartitahṛdayaḥ saṃpariṣvajya śarabhamuvāca-
248:66: prāṇā amī me śarabha tvadīyāḥ prāgeva yatrāsti mama prabhutvam|
248:67: tadarhasi draṣṭumidaṃ puraṃ me satyāṃ rucau tatra ca te'stu vāsaḥ||21||
248:69: hitvā bhavantaṃ mama nanvayuktamekasya gehābhimukhasya gantum||22||
248:73: abhyāsayogena hi sajjanasya svabhāvatāmeva guṇā vrajanti||23||
248:76: cikīrṣite te yadi matpriyaṃ tu vyādhavrataṃ vīra vimuñca tasmāt|
248:79: ityātmanaḥ syādanabhīpsitaṃ yanna tatpareṣvācarituṃ kṣamaṃ te||26||
248:80: kīrtikṣayaṃ sādhujanādvigarhāṃ duḥkhaṃ ca pāpaprabhavaṃ viditvā|
248:81: pāpaṃ dviṣatpakṣamivoddharasva nopekṣituṃ vyādhiriva kṣamaṃ te||27||
248:83: tānyeva puṇyāni vivardhayethā na karśanīyo hyupakāripakṣaḥ||28||
248:88: iti sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sāṃparāyikeṣvartheṣvanugṛhya saṃpratigṛhītavacanastena rājñā sabahumānamabhivīkṣyamāṇastameva vanāntaṃ praviveśa|
248:89: tadevaṃ jighāṃsumapyāpadgatamanukampanta eva mahākārūṇikā nopekṣanta iti karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyam|
248:92: evaṃ tiryaggatānāmapi mahātmanāṃ vadhakeṣvapi sānukrodhā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā |
248:93: ko manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā sattveṣvanukrośavikalaṃ śobheteti prāṇiṣu sānukrośenāryeṇa bhavitavyam|
